original: 6.3. Pariññāvāra🔽Yo kāyasaṅkhāraṁ parijānāti so vacīsaṅkhāraṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo vā pana vacīsaṅkhāraṁ parijānāti so kāyasaṅkhāraṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: pariññāvāra  yaḥ kāya saṅkhāram parijānāti saḥ vacī saṅkhāram parijānāti iti āmantā  yaḥ vā pana vacī saṅkhāram parijānāti saḥ kāya saṅkhāram parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: The Chapter on Full-understanding🔽Is it the case that whoever fully understands bodily volitions also fully understands verbal volitions? Yes.🔽Or is it the case that whoever fully understands verbal volitions also fully understands bodily volitions? Yes.

original: (Yathā khandhayamake pariññāvāraṁ vibhattaṁ evaṁ saṅkhārayamakepi pariññāvāraṁ vibhajitabbaṁ.)🔽Pariññāvāro.
analyzed: yathā khandha yamake pariññā vāram vibhattam evam saṅkhāra yamake pi pariññā vāram  pariññāvāro
translated: (As the chapter on the Faculties is analysed, so should the chapter on Determination be analysed.)🔽The Chapter on Determination🔽
The Chapter on Full-understanding is finished.🔽The Dyad on Volitions is finished.
